answerText: The Viy"[10] This story by the author of "The Viy" tells of Yakovlevich who finds the title object in his bread and Major Kovalyev who is the actual owner of that object. The story ends with Kovalyev reunited with the title object.
heading: Penn-ance |2012 | 01 | 10 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: The author's note claims that the title figure is the king of gnomes, and that title figure needs help raising his eyelids before he can command monsters to attack Khoma.  [10] Name that short story in which Khoma and two other students spend the night at a woman's house, but find out that that woman is a witch who then proceeds to kill Khoma with fright.
